photo.description: Grève générale / General Strike ~ Paris, France. Le jeudi 29 janvier 2009 fût synonyme de grève et manifestations a travers la France ; appelée par les syndicats pour protester contre le gouvernement sur des revendications aussi variées que la crise économique (et les réponses faite par le gouvernement), le niveau toujours très élevé du chômage, le pouvoir d’achat, le très grand nombre de réformes en cours. Ces photos sont de la plus importante des manifestations, tenue à Paris (jusqu’à 300 000 personnes – jusqu’à 2,5 millions à travers le pays selon les syndicats). Thursday 29th of January 2009 was a date synonymous with strikes and demonstrations across France; called for by trade unions in both the public and private sectors to protest against the government for a range of issues from the current economic crisis (and the government’s response to it), the continued high levels of unemployment, the cost of living, to the very large number of reforms currently being instigated. These photos are of the largest of the marches, that held in Paris (up to 300,000 people – with up to 2.5 million across the country according to union figures).
photo.tags: gréve strike rêve dream générale general revendication demand exprimer expression populaire popular gens people protest protestation manifestation marche march crise crisis social unrest agitation gauche left syndicat trade unions socialiste socialist communiste communist anti sarkozy président gouvernement government opposition place république paris france 29 janvier january 2009 grévestrikerêvedreamgénéralegeneralrevendicationdemandexprimerexpressionpopulairepopulargenspeopleprotestprotestationmanifestationmarchemarchcrisecrisissocialunrestagitationgaucheleftsyndicattradeunionssocialistesocialistcom

Ces photos sont de la plus importante des manifestations, tenue à Paris (jusqu’à 300 000 personnes – jusqu’à 2,5 millions à travers le pays selon les syndicats). Thursday 29th of January 2009 was a date synonymous with strikes and demonstrations across France; called for by trade unions in both the public and private sectors to protest against the government for a range of issues from the current economic crisis (and the government’s response to it), the continued high levels of unemployment, the cost of living, to the very large number of reforms currently being instigated. These photos are of the largest of the marches, that held in Paris (up to 300,000 people – with up to 2.5 million across the country according to union figures).
photo.tags: gréve strike rêve dream générale general revendication demand exprimer expression populaire popular gens people protest protestation manifestation marche march crise crisis social unrest agitation gauche left syndicat trade unions socialiste socialist communiste communist anti sarkozy président gouvernement government opposition place république paris france 29 janvier january 2009 grévestrikerêvedreamgénéralegeneralrevendicationdemandexprimerexpressionpopulairepopulargenspeopleprotestprotestationmanifestationmarchemarchcrisecrisissocialunrestagitationgaucheleftsyndicattradeunionssocialistesocialistcom

Ces photos sont de la plus importante des manifestations, tenue à Paris (jusqu’à 300 000 personnes – jusqu’à 2,5 millions à travers le pays selon les syndicats). Thursday 29th of January 2009 was a date synonymous with strikes and demonstrations across France; called for by trade unions in both the public and private sectors to protest against the government for a range of issues from the current economic crisis (and the government’s response to it), the continued high levels of unemployment, the cost of living, to the very large number of reforms currently being instigated. These photos are of the largest of the marches, that held in Paris (up to 300,000 people – with up to 2.5 million across the country according to union figures).
photo.tags: gréve strike rêve dream générale general revendication demand exprimer expression populaire popular gens people protest protestation manifestation marche march crise crisis social unrest agitation gauche left syndicat trade unions socialiste socialist communiste communist anti sarkozy président gouvernement government opposition place république paris france 29 janvier january 2009 grévestrikerêvedreamgénéralegeneralrevendicationdemandexprimerexpressionpopulairepopulargenspeopleprotestprotestationmanifestationmarchemarchcrisecrisissocialunrestagitationgaucheleftsyndicattradeunionssocialistesocialistcom

Ces photos sont de la plus importante des manifestations, tenue à Paris (jusqu’à 300 000 personnes – jusqu’à 2,5 millions à travers le pays selon les syndicats). Thursday 29th of January 2009 was a date synonymous with strikes and demonstrations across France; called for by trade unions in both the public and private sectors to protest against the government for a range of issues from the current economic crisis (and the government’s response to it), the continued high levels of unemployment, the cost of living, to the very large number of reforms currently being instigated. These photos are of the largest of the marches, that held in Paris (up to 300,000 people – with up to 2.5 million across the country according to union figures).
photo.tags: gréve strike rêve dream générale general revendication demand exprimer expression populaire popular gens people protest protestation manifestation marche march crise crisis social unrest agitation gauche left syndicat trade unions socialiste socialist communiste communist anti sarkozy président gouvernement government opposition place république paris france 29 janvier january 2009
